For those having trouble on windows 7 its because of windows account control fucking with it. Just right click>compatibility and run in compatibility  mode for windows xp sp3 and also run as administrator. It might not require win xp compatibility mode but I just did it in case it had any issues.

For those guys using windows 7 and having issues with patch, right click patch,properties, go to compatibility tab. Check Run This program in compatibility mode. Check on Privilege Level below to run it as administrator. The patch should work now.
